attributes.action: Legislate that Local Councils Open a Reasonable amount of Public Toilets and Police them in Towns & Cities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime minister legislation is required to force Local Councils to open a reasonable amount of public toilets in Towns & Cities.
They must be Policed to prevent men from using toilets for sexual practices and the lawless using them for criminal activity , to protect the public.
The policing could be self funded for example, Litter Attendants are being appointed in cities, culprits are fined if they disobey the law.
Toilet Attendants would have the power to fine criminals & men using the facilities for sex or criminal activity.
This would win the publics confidence to reclaim the toilets , for its original purpose , when nature calls.
